amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the National Endowment for the Arts, grants and administration by $10,600,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for the National Endowment for the Arts, grants and administration by $10,600,000 and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Walberg amendment (A045) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 240, 1 Present (Roll no. 670).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Walberg amendment (A045) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 240, 1 Present (Roll no. 670).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A045) offered by Mr. Walberg.
